textAfterTable: Game Overview Shadowrun Returns is a cyberpunk tactical role-playing video game under development by Harebrained Schemes, an indie game publisher led by Jordan Weisman, the creator of the Shadowrun tabletop role-playing game, and is being funded through crowdfunding website Kickstarter.
